patthana22.32:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.32:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anārammaṇo
patthana22.32:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe…
patthana22.32:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana22.32:6.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.

patthana22.32:8.1_1: cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā

patthana22.32:10.1_1: cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā
patthana22.32:11.1_1: cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe

patthana22.32:13.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana22.32:22.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:23.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ajjhattiko
patthana22.32:23.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa.
patthana22.32:24.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.

patthana22.32:25.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, adhipatiyā pañcatiṁsa …pe…
patthana22.32:26.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanoupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.32:27.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana22.32:27.1_1: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, anantare tīṇi …pe… upanissaye cha …pe… āhāre
patthana22.32:28.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinno
patthana22.32:28.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, sahajāte nissaye kamme
